other_tests.findings: Full-blown congestive heart failure with low ejection fraction and four-chamber cardiac dilation
Received a heart transplant and returned to prior psychiatric baseline
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improved ability to perform daily activities and reduction in movement disorder post-transplant

other_tests.findings: No significant medical complications from the transplant
other_tests.changes_over_time: Psychotic symptoms slightly reduced and movement disorder improved after transplant
